1.title: The Big Bet

episode of.title: Hardcore Pawn: Behind the Deal (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: Go behind the scenes with the Gold's as they recall Les and Seth's heated sales competition.

2.title: Acid Test

episode of.title: Hardcore Pawn: Behind the Deal (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: The Golds get real about old school vs. new school in this special, behind the scenes episode of Hardcore Pawn. Seth wants to purchase a pricey piece of equipment that could save the store thousands.

3.title: The Family Feud

episode of.title: Hardcore Pawn: Behind the Deal (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Go behind the curtain with the Golds as a family feud escalates when Seth disagrees with Les over the business.

4.title: Life After Death

episode of.title: Hardcore Pawn: Behind the Deal (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: Remember when Ashley quit the business? Seth and Les do. Look back with them, and see how Seth dealt with the pressure of being an only child at AJL.

5.title: Watch Your Back

episode of.title: Hardcore Pawn: Behind the Deal (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: This was the deal that nearly broke the Golds - go behind the scenes at American Jewelry and find out what really happened when Les allowed a $60,000 watch to walk out the door on a handshake agreement.

6.title: Stolen Gold

episode of.title: Hardcore Pawn: Behind the Deal (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: Sit in on a candid chat with the Golds, as they discuss what happened when Les discovered a bag of jewels in an employee's desk.

7.title: Tripped Out Cash

episode of.title: Hardcore Pawn: Behind the Deal (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: Look back with the Golds as they recall the smart, the stupid, and the deals too difficult to resist.

8.title: Fire Bomb

episode of.title: Hardcore Pawn: Behind the Deal (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: Find out how the Golds really feel when a customer tries to rip off the store in this special behind the scenes episode of Hardcore Pawn.

9.title: Back in Action

episode of.title: Hardcore Pawn: Behind the Deal (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: Hear what Ashley and Seth have to say about Les being back on top, following his operation.

10.title: Gold at Gunpoint

episode of.title: Hardcore Pawn: Behind the Deal (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: Get close and personal with the Golds as the family visits Les' grandfather's closed down pawn shop in downtown Detroit, and Les tells the story of a frightening stickup.

11.title: Rematch: Ashley vs. Tressa

episode of.title: Hardcore Pawn: Behind the Deal (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: Go behind the scenes with the Golds as they remember Tressa, a former employee and Ashley's nemesis, and her scheme to scam American Jewelry out of a sweet Rolex.

12.title: To Catch a Thief: Part 1

episode of.title: Hardcore Pawn: Behind the Deal (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: Find out what the Golds really think about one of the most infamous episodes in Hardcore Pawn history. When jewelry is found scattered, and the security video system conveniently goes down, Les knows something is afoot.

imdb.title: Hardcore Pawn: Behind the Deal
akas: Hardcore Pawn: Behind the Deal (United States)
plot: Go behind the counter and watch some of the greatest Hardcore Pawn episodes through the eyes of the Golds. In these golden nuggets, Les, Seth, and Ashley reveal tricks of the trade and some family secrets.
